Title: Day 8: 6:00 P.M. - 7:00 P.M.
Plot: Jack Bauer becomes further involved in preventing an assassination attempt on visiting president Omar Hassan. As the crisis continues to escalate, the crew at the newly upgraded CTU is challenged by some unexpected complicated circumstances. Meanwhile, tensions run high when an explosive event jeopardizes international security.
GuestStars: Kiefer Sutherland, Cherry Jones, Mary Lynn Rajskub
